descriptionHtml:
[b][i][size=5][center]Surelia RaceMenu Preset[/center]
[img]http://i64.tinypic.com/n70pt.png[/img]
[/size][/i][/b][color=#efefef]Firstly, sorry for my bad English, it’s not my mother tongue.

[/color][color=#efefef]This is a RaceMenu preset inspired by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82131/?]Serana and Claire mod by Plooshy.[/url] This preset is not a recreation of Serana in that mod, however. This is a completely different character that I’ve created from scratch.

[/color][color=#efefef]The preset was created for Imperial race, maybe it can be used with Nord race as well, I haven’t checked it yet. But I’m sure it would look kinda ugly. Especially with Elven races, so don’t even try :)

[/color][color=#efefef][b][i]Installation: [/i][/b]drop the preset file to Skyrim\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets

[/color][b][i][color=#efefef]Required mods:

[/color][/i][/b][color=#efefef][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/]RaceMenu[/url] (obviously)
[/color][color=#efefef][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]KS Hairdos
[/url][/color][color=#efefef][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]The Eyes of Beauty
[/url][/color][color=#efefef][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84400/]Immersive Warpaints and Tattoos[/url] (not required, but if you want the same warpaint as Surelia has you will need it)

[/color][color=#efefef][b][i]Recommended mods[/i][/b] (these mods are not required, but if you want your character to look exactly as on my screenshots you’ll have to download them too. Surely you won’t regret it):

[/color][color=#efefef][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72586/?]Pride of Valhalla
[/url][/color][color=#efefef][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP body (BASE version)[/url][/color][color=#efefef]
[/color][color=#efefef][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/]Brows
[/url][/color][color=#efefef]High Resolution Scars (unfortunately the mod author hid the file, so just google it)

[/color][color=#efefef]Also I use my own ENB preset. It’s far from perfect so I won’t upload it, but in any case - if you use ENB, she will look much better.

[/color][color=#efefef]I’m not so good at making screenshots, so you’re welcome to make your own screens and upload them here – I’d appreciate it.

[/color][b][i][size=3]My other works:[/size][/i][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85189/?]Varaniel RaceMenu preset[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84926?]Rindi RaceMenu preset[/url]
author: Heartless1453
